title: The best thing I ever did was stop playing this game.
body:
Watched a friend play the game today and was just disgusted that Diamonds are so stupid, every game he played they did the same shit.
Instead of contesting Dragons.. they just.. ran away, despite them having a better teamfight and more health. This server is just to pro.

replies.body:
> This server is just to pro

I'll leave this here.
doesn't play the game, still comes to these boards t shitpost,looks like you still dwelling on this game

> [{quoted}](name=greatdeathz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OL6M2njw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-13T11:18:57.400+0000)
>
> doesn't play the game, still comes to these boards t shitpost,looks like you still dwelling on this game

The boards are not the game, but look at you, bronzeV 0LP, negative W/L ratio.
God you're pathetic.
But you don't even play so why would you care?

> [{quoted}](name=sparklefart,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OL6M2njw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-13T11:56:07.507+0000)
>
> But you don't even play so why would you care?

I care when BronzeV trash post on my threads, if he was a respectable rank I may have cared what he said.

You talk about respectable rank and 'your threads' but you are level 27. You may be a smurf, but who cares, Bronze 5s may have absolutely no game knowledge, but not everything they say is wrong. The fact is that Greatdeathz said absolutely nothing to do with gameplay, so why are you not respecting it?

You talk about pathetic but you're judging by rank. You don't even play this game so why should you care. For what it's worth, your friend was probably boosted. lol.

> [{quoted}](name=hi im neko,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OL6M2njw,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-14T01:42:14.218+0000)
>
> You talk about respectable rank and 'your threads' but you are level 27. You may be a smurf, but who cares, Bronze 5s may have absolutely no game knowledge, but not everything they say is wrong. The fact is that Greatdeathz said absolutely nothing to do with gameplay, so why are you not respecting it?
> 
> You talk about pathetic but you're judging by rank. You don't even play this game so why should you care. For what it's worth, your friend was probably boosted. lol.

Lmfao, of course I'm judging by rank and what he said was far from wrong, it was a failed troll attempt. I don't think he was, he's pretty good even when I watch him in person, he knows what he's doing. Unlike these bronze trash players.
ITS STILL ABOUT THE GAME, AND YOU ARE A LOSER WHO COMES ON IT TO BAG PPL OUT, and lol at you actually wasting time to check my account out, looks life u have no life

> [{quoted}](name=greatdeathz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OL6M2njw,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-03-14T02:52:23.574+0000)
>
> ITS STILL ABOUT THE GAME, AND YOU ARE A LOSER WHO COMES ON IT TO BAG PPL OUT,

That caps lock rage and twelvie abuse!

By the way: people*

that ad hominen attack and resorting to grammar, this usually happens when an argument is lost
good day to you:)

> [{quoted}](name=greatdeathz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OL6M2njw,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-14T03:43:11.437+0000)

It was spelling, not grammar.

6-8/10 players in diam elo games are usually boosted trash or people trolling soooo you're probably watching the equivelent of silver games but the riven mains who snowball can fast combo and sometimes the ADCs can position well kek
